scripts.build: yarn run build:ui && yarn run build:n2o && yarn run build:simple
scripts.version:patch: yarn workspace @i-novus/n2o-components version --patch --no-git-tag-version && yarn workspace n2o-framework version --patch --no-git-tag-version && yarn version:updateDeps
scripts.version:minor: yarn workspace @i-novus/n2o-components version --minor --no-git-tag-version && yarn workspace n2o-framework version --minor --no-git-tag-version && yarn version:updateDeps
scripts.version:major: yarn workspace @i-novus/n2o-components version --major --no-git-tag-version && yarn workspace n2o-framework version --major --no-git-tag-version && yarn version:updateDeps
scripts.compile:watch: concurrently --kill-others "yarn run compile:lib:watch" "yarn run compile:dist:watch" "yarn run compile:n2o-components-lib:watch"
scripts.clean: yarn workspace n2o-simple-project clean && yarn workspace n2o-framework clean && rimraf ./node_modules/
